title: One dead in a tragic accident in Maligawatte
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A tragic motor accident took place opposite the Maligawatte Police Station on Thursday (29) morning claiming one life, and sending two others to the hospital.
The deceased was identified as a 30-year-old man from Kelaniya.
The accident was the result of a collision between a motorcycle and a three-wheeler.
The three-wheeler driver and a pedestrian were injured and admitted to the hospital.
